snippet.title: Journey to the Rift Trailer
snippet.description:
The official trailer for the upcoming text-based adventure from Project Linkativity! Prepare to delve into a world fuelled by your imagination, as you solve puzzles, tackle monsters, and uncover the mysteries of a strange and perilous dungeon!

Journey to the Rift will be releasing on Steam later this year, with mobile devices to follow soon after. Stay up-to-date on all the latest Journey to the Rift news at the Project Linkativity website, and sign up for our newsletter to be the first to hear about upcoming updates!
